message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints but $9,000 is too low for me to consider.  How about we split the difference closer to my original price and say $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
